message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you, estimated at $12000 based on its unique features and benefits. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $11000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while also securing your satisfaction with the product. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to serve you. Kind regards, Alice.
